mapper.select: select t.flow_action_service_id,t2.service_name, t1.service_method_name, t1.service_method_desc, t1.remark from sys_flow_action_service t, sys_service_method t1,sys_service t2 where t.service_method_id = t1.service_method_id and t2.service_id=t1.service_id and t.flow_controller_action_id = '${flowControllerActionId}'
